Dieses Spiel ist einfach ein noch nie da gewesenes Erlebnis, macht riesig spaß vorallem mit einem Team. Auch die Spielmechanik ist sehr gut gemacht. Und die optische sowie akustische Umsetztung ist super geil, es kommt teilweise richtig gruselig rüber. Schlechte Faktoren würden mir auf Atok garnicht einfallen.
если даже у игры хорошая идея, персонажи и перки, то жестко пошатанння оптимизация убивает удовольствие от игры напрочь. игру не советую. разрабы просто пилят бабла

기본적으로 술래잡기 형식 게임이고, 살인마 입장에서는 운영의 묘미가 있고, 생존자 입장에서는 협동의 묘미가 있습니다. 생존자 4명이 각각 개인전을 해버리면 스트레스 받을 경우도 많지만 협동 해서 탈출 했을 때 쾌감이 있습니다.
게임적으로 보았을 때 버그도 많지만 운영진들이 밸런스를 위해 지속적으로 업데이트를 해 바람직합니다.

Best horror game i have ever played, it's now also cross-platefourm so you can play with other friends from console etc. Worth the money you can get a decent amount of hours out of it! even better playing with friends

If you have 15-30 minutes to waste in between games as a killer, This game is perfect for you, If you're a survivor, it's alot quicker, The wait time for being a killer hasn't been addressed in over 2 years, I wouldn't reccomend this game.

Got the game around the time it got released and have been on a hiatus because of many broken mechanics and technical issues taking forever to be patched back then. Now i am back and let me tell you the problems i still face in the game.


Cons:
- Killer takes forever ( 25 - 45 mins) to find a game , and if you do get it cross your fingers that the host did not disconnect or any other player at the start of the game or else .. yes .. back to playing ForeverQue again.
- There are still mythical problems like the forever Loading Screen which i have faced after playing the game in a solo que.
- As a killer who can face alot of challenges to attempt and kill all 4 survivors , i feel the amount of Bloodpoints awarded is inadequate hence more Player(s) tend to prefer being a Survivor instead upsetting the balance of matchmaking of requiring both parties to play.

Pros:
- There are now more 'Rewards' for playing the game such as cosmetics items ( but its not really balanced out like for example; Freddy Krueger( The Nightmare), Leatherface (The Cannibal ) Does not receive any (or little) customizable cosmetics and they are characters who has been awhile in the game despite being DLCs so if you enjoy Cosmetics for your friendly neighbourhood killers do some research and see if there are any available for that survivor/killer.
- Mechanics of the game has been patched as not to allow exploitable actions such as vaulting for survivors at the same window(etc) is limited to i believe 3 attempts. 

As for now this are the Pro(s) and Con(s) i can think of which are rather General. I won't touch on items or broken perks as those could be nerfed/buffed.
Killer แทบอยู่ไม่ได้แล้วโว้ยยยยยยยยยย

Мой первый обзор. Купили игру год назад. Это одна из единиц покупок которая доставила и доставляет удовольствия до сих пор. Онлайн игры хороший. Баланса,фиксов и изменений с первого момента прошло достаточно. Игрой разрабы занимаются. Игра 1 на 4. Рекомендую игру! Берите,нужно лишь немного приловчиться. В компании играть даже удобнее и веселее. Временами игра модет порвать ваш пукан,а в основном ржач до слез. Действительно  не жалеем,что купили. Оптимизация хорошая. Вобщем,любителям хоррор игр понравится. Игра достаточно уже знаменита и развивается каждым днем
I'm addicted. Help. The game won't stop pulling me in.
Игра годная,не совсем страшная,можно повеселиться с друзьями или же побомбить на раков в тиме.Рекомендую!

[b]Esse jogo tem uma ideia excelente,porém peca bastante na gameplay.[/b]
[h1]Os principais problemas são:[/h1]
- [i]Hitbox completamente mal feita,onde o killer da um hit no ar e o jogo conta como acerto[/i]
- [i]Sistema de pareamento de jogadores está quebrado,onde um sobrevivente que está no rank 1 pode cair com um killer rank 20 ou vice versa,e ainda não há recompensa por subir de rank[/i]
- [i]Foco em lançamento de skins e outras coisas pagas e não em correção de bugs frequentes[/i]
- [i]Extresse contínuo se você joga sozinho ou com alguém[/i]
- [i]Diversos nerf´s desnecessários[/i]
- [i]Demora absurda para conseguir boas habilidades e achar partidas(essa última como killer)[/i]
-[i]Eventos bugados[/i]
Esses são só os problemas técnicos(tirando o extresse,é óbvio),nem me darei ao trabalho de adentrar no mérito dos jogadores que reclamam intensamente,não jogam direito,se matam no começo da partida e etc...
Meu conselho,[u]não compre este jogo[/u] - [i]Análise feita no dia 08/11/2019[/i]
[i]Atualizada em 04/07/2020[/i]
